name: LACity
0:
”Alexa, Ask L. A. City for family events”
”Alexa, Ask L. A. City if there was an earthquake”
”Alexa, Ask L. A. City to play the news”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: l. a. city
Developer Terms of Use
des: Talk to LA City and stay in touch with city happenings! You can currently ask for the news, earthquake reports, and events in the city.
